name: funky robo
description: a game where you get parts for your robot friend so he can dance. Controls: AD to walk, W to jump, S to talk to robofriend, LeftClick to shoot. also this is my first actual game im publishing and i did have any partners here is the sourcecode: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XNiy-uW-m1aYs24mD1Tp3FcvXQMIPMwM
